reviewText: I am unable to install the amazon video app onto my Samsung Note 5, any suggestions? I'm an amazon prime member.

I've been studying the Wu Style Tai Chi with two different Chinese Grandmasters for almost a year, and the routine sequence on the DVD is not the sequence of moves that is taught in the traditional Wu Style. The instructor moves too fast for the beginner to grasp the details of the movement, the video quality is very poor.

The Sun style was derived from the Wu Hao style and they are both very similar. So, no, this isn't the Wu style. The presentation and instruction is quite clear from a visual perspective although the english subtitles aren't always good translations.
This DVD is not what it claims. As the back liner notes reveal, it is actually Sun style. It is elegantly demonstrated, but it is NOT Wu style in any form, despite the front cover.
